body_html:
At a guess, does it work if you change the flag

--inception_checkpoint_file="${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"

...to add ./ at the beginning of the filename?

--inception_checkpoint_file="./${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"

I think there's a fix for this pending, but /cc @rohan100jain to be sure!

body:
At a guess, does it work if you change the flag

```
--inception_checkpoint_file="${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"
```

...to add `./` at the beginning of the filename?

```
--inception_checkpoint_file="./${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"
```

I think there's a fix for this pending, but /cc @rohan100jain to be sure!
